name: Moon Potion
description:
Moon potion is a potion shop simulation game.

This project is for the event game off. Inspired by game dev tycoon. 

You are a potion researcher who start a new lab in the rpg "Dungeon town".

You will do the research the items which are useful for the people in the town. If they think what you do is useful, they will donates the money to you.

Everyday you will have the pay the rent (100 gold). if you don't have that amount of money at the end of the day. Your lab will go bankrupt ! Game over.

If it goes well I will consider to make the full version and improve the graphics quality.

Please give me feedbacks. I would like to improve myself.

--- Dark Lord ---
